Source.Name: jpegrescan
Source.Summary: JPEGrescan is a perl script that uses jpeg tools to optimise jpeg compression.
Source.Description: JPEGrescan is a perl script that uses jpeg tools to optimise jpeg compression by micro-managing some of the compression math based on research into some of the most common parameters.

Package.Name: jpegrescan
Package.Summary: JPEGrescan is a perl script that uses jpeg tools to optimise jpeg compression.
Package.Description: JPEGrescan is a perl script that uses jpeg tools to optimise jpeg compression by micro-managing some of the compression math based on research into some of the most common parameters.
